titleStmt.title: Rules and instructions for the tare of goods & merchandize imported into any port of England: revised and published by the Farmers of His Majesties Customs. As a direction to all their officers concerned therein.
titleStmt.author: Farmers of His Majesties Customs.
Whittell, S.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Jesus College (University of Cambridge) Library.
